title: Ola Electric store count to touch 4,000 this Christmas; CEO Bhavish Aggarwal eyes presence in 'every town, city, tehsil' | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
Ola Electric store count to touch 4,000 this Christmas; CEO Bhavish Aggarwal eyes presence in ’every town, city, tehsil’

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

Ola Electric aims to significantly increase its store presence to 4,000 by Christmas, with CEO Bhavish Aggarwal highlighting the affordability of electric vehicles.

  • Ola Electric anticipates reaching 4,000 stores by Christmas.
  • Customers can save around ₹4,000 per month by using Ola's electric vehicles.
  • New electric bike models were released on Independence Day in 2024: Roadster Pro, Roadster, and Roadster X.
  • Ola aims to integrate its own batteries into vehicles starting in the first quarter of the next financial year.
  • Ola's first electric scooter, the S1 Pro, was delivered in December 2021.
“With EVs, you will save ₹4,000 per month. Your savings will increase, and you'll save money with this savings wala scooter,” - Bhavish Aggarwal

Ola Electric’s expansion plans reflect its commitment to increasing accessibility to electric vehicles across various regions.
newTitle: Ola Electric Expands Store Count to 4,000 by Christmas

title: On Ravichandran Ashwin's Successor In Team India, Sunil Gavaskar's Massive "Ahead Of Him" Verdict For Youngster - NDTV Sports
summary:
Sunil Gavaskar Weighs In on Ashwin's Successor in Team India

Publication Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: NDTV Sports

Ravichandran Ashwin's sudden retirement has left a significant void for the Indian cricket team. With the upcoming Boxing Day Test against Australia, discussions around his potential successor have intensified, particularly focusing on Washington Sundar.

  • Ashwin was the world's highest active wicket-taker with 537 wickets.
  • Sunil Gavaskar commented on Ashwin's untimely retirement and the team's adjustments moving forward.
  • Gavaskar hinted that Washington Sundar might be favored as Ashwin's successor.
“Maybe Washington Sundar is ahead of him. Rohit mentioned that he is flying out tomorrow. So, this marks the end of Ashwin as an international cricketer.” – Sunil Gavaskar

The Indian cricket team will face challenges as they adapt to Ashwin's absence, which may have significant implications for the upcoming series.
newTitle: Sunil Gavaskar Weighs In on Ashwin's Successor in Team India

Kalonji oil, derived from the seeds of Nigella sativa, is praised for its multiple health benefits and traditional medicinal value. Here are the top 8 benefits of incorporating this oil into your wellness routine.

  • Boosts immunity
  • Supports digestive health
  • Promotes healthy skin
  • Enhances hair growth
  • Improves heart health
  • Aids in weight loss
  • Alleviates joint pain

title: CAT Result 2024 Released at iimcat.ac.in; Download scorecard, check percentile - IE Education
summary:
CAT Result 2024 Released at iimcat.ac.in; Download scorecard, check percentile

Publication Date: [Date not provided], Source: Indian Express

The Indian Institute of Management Calcutta has released the CAT 2024 results, with over 73 candidates achieving top scores. The scorecards are available online, providing detailed percentile scores.

  • CAT 2024 result released at iimcat.ac.in; candidates can download their scorecards using their registration number and password.
  • 14 candidates scored a perfect 100 percentile, with the highest numbers from Maharashtra, followed by Delhi and Andhra Pradesh.
  • A total of 29 and 30 candidates achieved 99.99 and 99.98 percentiles, respectively.
  • Only 4 female candidates made it to the topper list this year, compared to 69 male candidates.
  • 59 engineering candidates topped the exam, with a total of 15 from non-engineering backgrounds.
A total of 14 candidates have achieved a perfect 100 percentile score.

This year's CAT results showcase a notable gender disparity among top scorers and highlight the dominance of engineering students in the top ranks.

title: Mumbai ferry accident: Missing body recovered, death toll rises to 14 - The Times of India
summary:
Mumbai ferry accident: Missing body recovered, death toll rises to 14

Publication Date: October 12, 2023 Source: Times of India

In Mumbai, the ongoing recovery efforts have led to the discovery of another body from the tragic ferry accident, increasing the confirmed death toll to 14. Rescue operations continue as authorities seek to recover any remaining victims.

  • The accident involved a ferry that capsized in Mumbai waters.
  • Search operations have been conducted by local authorities, including divers and rescue teams.
  • Safety regulations and ferry operations have come under scrutiny following the incident.
“We will continue our efforts until every victim is accounted for.” - Local Official

The tragic incident has raised serious concerns regarding maritime safety regulations in Mumbai. The local government has promised a comprehensive investigation into the ferry's operational safety.
newTitle: Mumbai ferry accident: Missing body recovered, death toll rises to 14

title: Women Need To Realise That Beneficial Laws Aren't Means To Threaten, Domineer Or Extort From Their... - Live Law - Indian Legal News
summary:
Supreme Court Warns Against Misuse of Domestic Violence Laws by Wives

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Law

In a recent ruling, the Supreme Court cautioned women against misusing domestic violence and dowry laws, which are intended for their protection. The Court reiterated that these laws are being exploited for personal gain in matrimonial disputes.

  • The Court highlighted an alarming trend of invoking various sections of the Indian Penal Code, such as 498A and 376, as a collective strategy to pressure husbands.
  • Justices BV Nagarathna and NK Singh noted that these provisions should not be used for intimidation or extortion.
  • Minor disputes can escalate due to the misuse, leading to irreconcilable relationships.
  • The Court emphasized that criminal complaints should not serve as negotiation tools for monetary demands.
“The women need to be careful about the fact that these strict provisions of law in their hands are beneficial legislations for their welfare and not means to chastise, threaten, domineer or extort from their husbands.”

Ultimately, the Supreme Court urged for a careful and fair application of these laws to ensure they serve their intended purpose without exploitation.
newTitle: Supreme Court Warns Against Misuse of Domestic Violence Laws by Wives

summary:
Human error behind chopper crash that killed CDS Bipin Rawat: Report

Publication Date: [Date not provided] Source: [Source not provided]

Authorities have reported that human error was the primary cause of the helicopter crash that resulted in the tragic death of Chief of Defense Staff (CDS) Bipin Rawat.

  • The investigation revealed that the flight team failed to adequately assess the weather conditions.
  • Deficiencies in pilot training and inadequate pre-flight checks were highlighted.
  • This incident signals potential systemic issues within military aviation safety protocols.
“This tragic event underscores the critical importance of rigorous training and adherence to safety protocols in military operations.”

The findings emphasize a need for immediate reforms to prevent such incidents in the future.

Mayawati says Ambedkar's dignity hurt, Amit Shah must take back 'these words' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Mayawati Condemns Amit Shah's Comments on Ambedkar

Publication Date: Dec 19, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

In a press conference, BSP chief Mayawati criticized Union Home Minister Amit Shah for remarks made in the Rajya Sabha that she claims hurt the dignity of Dr. B.R. Ambedkar, the architect of the Indian Constitution. She demanded Shah retract his statement and repent for the anger it has caused among Ambedkar's followers.

  • Mayawati stated that Shah's comments insulted Ambedkar and deeply affected his dignity.
  • She emphasized that there is widespread anger against Shah for his remarks.
  • Shah's comments were made during a debate on the Constitution, suggesting the Congress party exploits Ambedkar's name.
  • Shah claimed that if Congress had invoked God's name as often as Ambedkar, they would attain heaven.
“The words used by Amit Shah in the Parliament about the architect of the Indian Constitution and messiah of Dalits and other neglected classes... have greatly hurt Baba Saheb's dignity.” - Mayawati

This incident has sparked protests from various political parties and is indicative of the ongoing tensions regarding the representation and respect of Dalit icons in Indian politics.
newTitle: Mayawati Condemns Amit Shah's Comments on Ambedkar

title: ‘His life is hanging by a thread’: Doctors on fasting farmer leader Jagjit Singh Dallewal - Hindustan Times
summary:
‘His life is hanging by a thread’: Doctors on fasting farmer leader Jagjit Singh Dallewal

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: HT News Desk

Farmer leader Jagjit Singh Dallewal has entered the 24th day of his fast-unto-death, pressing the government for a legal guarantee of minimum support price (MSP) for crops. His health has deteriorated significantly, and he is now in a critical condition, at risk of cardiac arrest.

Key Points:

  • Dallewal, 70, has not eaten for 24 days as part of his protest.
  • Doctors report that his health is critical, with risks of cardiac arrest and multi-organ failure.
  • The Supreme Court has criticized the Punjab government for failing to conduct timely health tests on Dallewal.
“His life is hanging by a thread.” - Doctors attending Dallewal

The situation is becoming increasingly urgent as his health continues to decline.
newTitle: Critical Condition of Farmer Leader Jagjit Singh Dallewal Amid Ongoing Fast

title: ‘Mukesh Rajput’s BP still high, Pratap Sarangi a cardiac patient': Doctors on injured BJP MPs - Hindustan Times
summary:
Injured BJP MPs Mukesh Rajput and Pratap Sarangi Hospitalized Following Parliament Scuffle

Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Two BJP MPs, Mukesh Rajput and Pratap Sarangi, were admitted to RML Hospital due to injuries sustained during a scuffle outside Parliament. Doctors reported that both MPs had head injuries and were being monitored for blood pressure-related issues.

  • Both MPs admitted to RML Hospital following injuries from an altercation.
  • Doctors stated that both sustained head injuries and have high blood pressure concerns.
  • Defence Minister Rajnath Singh visited the MPs and reported that they would remain in the hospital for observation.
  • Ajay Shukla, the Medical Superintendent, provided updates on their conditions.
  • The incident has sparked political tensions, with BJP and Congress filing complaints against each other.
“Rajput ji's blood pressure is still high. We are doing our best possible.” – Dr. Ajay Shukla

The condition of the MPs requires careful observation following a violent confrontation that underscores ongoing political tensions.
newTitle: Injured BJP MPs Mukesh Rajput and Pratap Sarangi Hospitalized Following Parliament Scuffle

title: ‘We share same fight’: Gisèle Pelicot's first reaction after mass-rape judgment - Hindustan Times
summary:
'We share same fight': Gisèle Pelicot's First Reaction After Mass-Rape Judgment

Date & Source: Dec 19, 2024 08:18 PM IST - HT News Desk

Introduction: A French court found Dominique Pelicot, Gisèle Pelicot's ex-husband, guilty of repeatedly drugging and raping his wife for almost a decade. The verdict was a landmark judgement that has horrified the world.

  • Gisèle Pelicot's first remark after the judgement was 'We share the same fight.'
  • Pelicot expressed support for other victims of sexual violence.
  • Dominique Pelicot was sentenced to 20 years in prison.
  • All 50 co-defendants were found guilty of rape or related charges.
I respect the court and the decision of its verdict. I never regretted opening the trial to the public and was now thinking of the unrecognised victims whose stories often remain in the shadows.

Conclusion: Gisèle Pelicot's courage and determination during the trial have made her a symbol of feminist strength. The case highlights the importance of seeking justice for victims of sexual violence.
newTitle: 'We share same fight': Gisèle Pelicot's First Reaction After Mass-Rape Judgment

title: Pakistan Tries To Arm-Twist China Over Gwadar Port. The Plan Backfires. - NDTV
summary:
Pakistan Tries To Arm-Twist China Over Gwadar Port. The Plan Backfires.

Publication Date: Date not specified
Source: Article not specified

Islamabad attempts to leverage its relationship with China by demanding a second-strike nuclear capability in exchange for granting military access to the strategic Gwadar port, but faces rejection from Beijing.

  • Pakistan engaged in high-level talks with China regarding the Gwadar port.
  • Islamabad made a controversial demand for nuclear capabilities in exchange for military access.
  • Beijing rejected the demand and suspended discussions, signaling a downturn in diplomatic relations.
  • The Pakistani military historically relies on China for military support and economic bailouts.
  • The demand for nuclear capabilities could lead China to violate international treaties.
"By demanding a second strike nuclear capability, Pakistan is risking serious diplomatic repercussions for its obsession with countering India."

This incident signifies a challenging moment for Pakistan as it navigates its relationships with key allies while dealing with internal crises.
newTitle: Pakistan's Failed Negotiation With China Over Gwadar Port

title: Superman Teaser Trailer: May The Force Be With David Corenswet - NDTV Movies
summary:
Superman Teaser Trailer: May The Force Be With David Corenswet

Publication Date: New Delhi

The highly anticipated teaser trailer for James Gunn's new Superman film has been released, introducing David Corenswet in the iconic role.

  • The teaser shows Superman in a snowy landscape, injured, with a notable quote: "Take me home" when Krypto the Superdog approaches him.
  • David Corenswet portrays both Superman and his alter ego, Clark Kent, who works for The Daily Planet.
  • Key characters introduced include Lois Lane, Lex Luthor, and Jimmy Olsen.
  • Other DC characters making appearances include Mister Terrific, Guy Gardner, Hawkgirl, and Metamorpho.
  • James Gunn emphasizes that the new Superman embodies humanity and kindness despite being an alien.
“The next Superman has to be someone who has all the humanity that Superman has but he's also an alien.” - James Gunn

This film marks David Corenswet's biggest Hollywood project to date, being the fourth actor to take on the Superman role.
newTitle: Superman Teaser Trailer: May The Force Be With David Corenswet

title: BJP MLC C T Ravi arrested for 'derogatory' remarks against Karnataka minister Laxmi Hebbalkar - Deccan Herald
summary:
BJP MLC C T Ravi Arrested for Derogatory Remarks Against Karnataka Minister Laxmi Hebbalkar

Published: 19 December 2024, Source: Deccan Herald

Senior BJP lawmaker C T Ravi was arrested in Belagavi after being accused of making derogatory comments about Women & Child Development Minister Laxmi Hebbalkar during a session in the Legislative Council.

  • Ravi was charged with sexual harassment and insulting the modesty of a woman based on a complaint from Hebbalkar.
  • Supporters of Hebbalkar attempted to attack Ravi, leading to police detentions.
  • The incident escalated amid heated exchanges between Congress and BJP members in the Council.
  • Hebbalkar alleged that Ravi called her a 'prostitute' and made lewd gestures.
  • Ravi denied the allegations, claiming he used different words and maintained his respect for women.
“No woman will publicly lodge a complaint stating that such a word was used about her.” - Basavaraj Horatti, Council Chairperson.

The altercation highlights tensions between political parties in Karnataka, with both sides calling for introspection and accountability.
newTitle: BJP MLC C T Ravi Arrested for Derogatory Remarks Against Minister

In a thrilling match, India Women set a record score of 217/4 against West Indies in the 3rd T20I. Richa Ghosh scored an 18-ball fifty, making it the joint-fastest in WT20Is.

  • Richa Ghosh's rapid fifty propels India to a formidable total.
  • The series is level at 1-1 after West Indies' win in the previous match.

This match sets the stage for an exciting finish in the T20I series, followed by an ODI series as part of the ICC Championship.

Ravichandran Ashwin's father has made shocking claims that his son faced long-term humiliation, contributing to his decision to retire from international cricket during India's tour of Australia.

  • Ashwin's retirement announcement took many by surprise, including his father.
  • His father suggested that a lack of a regular spot in the playing XI may have led to feelings of humiliation for Ashwin.
  • Ashwin retires as India’s second-most successful bowler in Test history with 765 wickets across formats.
“What was going on in his mind I don’t know. He just announced. I too accepted it with full pleasure.” - Ravichandran Ashwin's father

Pushpa 2 has taken the box office by storm, completing two weeks of release and on track to become the biggest blockbuster in Hindi cinema history.

  • Fastest Indian film to reach over Rs 1,500 crore worldwide within the same timeframe.

summary:

Pushpa 2 has been dominating the box office ever since its release on December 5, crossing the Rs 1500 crore milestone worldwide in just 15 days.

title: LG's transparent, wireless OLED TV is now available for $59,999 - TechSpot

LG has launched its much-anticipated transparent OLED TV, priced at $59,999, which features wireless technology and a unique design that allows images to appear as if they are floating.

  • The 77-inch Signature OLED T is now available for purchase.
  • It includes a Zero Connect Box for wireless connectivity.
  • A T-Bar enhances functionality with status updates and information on the screen.
